description_html:
Capri Lounge is a “unique” lounge chair, offering extraordinary ergonomics. Like the classic lounge chairs, it
is exceptionally comfortable and takes center stage in any space where it is integrated. Capri Lounge
was born from the desire to create a current and practical design for lounge and active relaxation
areas. Capri Lounge stands out for the purity and elegance of its lines, with an enveloping and harmonic
design, which complements perfectly with impeccable comfort, resulting from a specific work of
ergonomics and a careful selection of qualities in the foams.
Capri is not only a upholstered shell, it is a piece with a great three-dimensionality in its geometry that
transmits a great visual comfort and with a lower part characterized by its completely upholstered
tapering shape that contributes richness and turns it into an iconic object.
Capri Lounge is offered with and without armrests and has two versions of arms: the first option
comes with fully upholstered arms, which provide comfort thanks to its wide support area and a
genuine and elegant aesthetic, with an outstanding work of tapestry In all its details, and another
option of aluminum arms that following the same line of design, is characterized by being made in
aluminum injection and with the top upholstered, conveying lightness, comfort and technology.
